content.rendered:
TRADING CONDITIONS

STEADY EXECUTION

Stable, high-speed execution in the range of milliseconds.

Considering that the majority of traders is always seeking to experience a reliable trading environment, we’re offering leading broker technology with True ECN / STP trading, no dealing desk intervention, and low latency with no rejections.

Fair Pricing

Market-leading price feeds streamlined by our trusted interbank liquidity in a fair and transparent trading environment for all traders.

Low Spreads

Raw DMA/STP spreads as low as 0.0 pips. Clear pricing with no commission fees charged.

No Dealing Desk (NDD)

Instant access to the interbank market with no dealing interference or rejections while trading.

MARGIN & LEVERAGE

Low Margin Requirements

Increase your trading exposure with low margin requirements and leverage of up to 1:500.

MARGIN & LEVERAGE

We allow you to set your own trading limits with the freedom to choose a leverage ratio from 1:1 to 1:500, depending on your trading goals and exposure needed.

Leverage enables traders to manage big position sizes with little investment. We offer excellent margin trading conditions for all types of accounts. You can enjoy the maximum leverage of 1:500 on our Silver, Gold, Platinum and Pro accounts.

BROAD CHOICE OF MARKETS

Invest in the most traded financial markets

We allow you to set your own trading limits with the freedom to choose leverage ratio from 1:1 to 1:500, depending on your trading goals and exposure needed.

TRADING PRODUCTS

Forex Currencies

More than 60 major, minor and exotic currency pairs to trade in the Foreign Exchange market.

Energies & Commodities

Trade commodities and energies such as Gold, Coffee, Crude Oil, Natural Gas and many more.

Stock CFDs

Buy and sell your favorite equities/stocks from all popular markets such as UK, Germany and USA.

Ccryptocurrencies

Invest and trade in the ever-growing and wide range of both new and old cryptocurrency pairs introduced into the market.

Client Funds (including unrealized profits) are held in separate client money trust accounts with a AA graded banks using the highest level of protection.

For optimal security, our trading technology is entirely encrypted with SSL (Secure Sockets Layer), an essential security practice that empowers full protection against any fraudulent activities. On top, all transactions and private information of our clients are highly sheltered.

TRUST & INTEGRITY MADE SIMPLE

Safety of Client Funds

When trading with us, all clients’ funds are held in segregated accounts

OPEN A TRADING ACCOUNT NOW
WHAT IS MARGIN?

Margin is the minimal amount held by the broker when placing a trading order.

The notion of margin is at times confused with a cost that a trader owes to the broker.

However, in fact, it is a minimal amount held by the broker when placing a trading order, to ensure that the available balance of the trading account is adequate to the size of the opened position. The level of margin that is needed always depends on the position size and the instrument that is traded.

SEE ALSO

Margin & Leverage

Leverage enables traders to manage big position sizes with little investment.

Read More

Range of Markets

Invest in the most traded financial markets including FX, Energies, Futures and Stock CFDs

Read More

Trading Platforms

Powerful trading with MetaTrader 4, the most advanced platform for PC, Web and Mobile

Read More

Safety of Funds

We are operating under strict international regulations and laws, and have a commitment to safeguarding clients’ interests. When trading with us, you’re fully protected by our robust financial safety measurements.

Read More
